u.a: <aft> picks up man by dollhouse and holds over bench
<1w> picks up another object , holds it , touches grill
rights grill . moves chair toward grill
<aft> puts hand on dollhouse rim , scaning dollhouse <bef> rights grill . puts man in chair .
<1w> puts hand over grill , picks up imaginary hot dog , and puts on imaginary plate .
<1w> picks up imaginary food and puts out plate
puts arm in and out of dollhouse quickly
examines chair and puts down by dollhouse . puts index finger in chair
reaches in dollhouse , takes arm out . reaches in again and takes chair out
<dur> succeeds <bef> picks up man and attempts to put in bench .
picks up another man and successfully puts in bench
leans over dollhouse and sits back down
<aft> attempts to put in chair and finally succeeds
picks up mom and makes her shut the door
picks up mom and holds . opens dollhouse door and holds at top of door
pushes mom through door and she falls in
picks up doll , holds and puts in chair
picks up bed and rubs against door . puts hand on door knob and opens door slightly
tweezer-like touch to man's face . touches own mouth . touches grill top
<6w-7w> points to dollhouse <1w-5w> points to toys .
grabs some toys and throws in dollhouse
<aft> picks up more toys and tosses in dollhouse
continues to pick up toys and toss in dollhouse
picks up toys and puts in dollhouse
puts open shape box in front of Linda
picks up nesting cups and bed and puts in dollhouse . picks up bed and puts in dollhouse
<bef> moves dollhouse away . pushes shape box toward Linda
pushes shape box toward self and rummages . takes object out and attempts to put through open lid . rubs object on lid
holds shape box block . puts block down and holds hands up , ready to begin
picks up block and puts in shape box
picks up shape box block on floor and holds . attempts to put in shape box , trying different holes
<dur> puts block in correct hole <bef> tries another wrong hole .
pushes block through but it's stuck
picks up ball and puts in shape box
pushes ball through again and it gets stuck . touches floor . reaches for ball across shape box
<1w-2w> picks up object and lifts lid to shape box . <1w> puts ball in shape box .
<1w> puts object down <1w> picks up object and lifts lid to shape box .
takes one ball out of shape box . shuts lid
puts hand to lid but stops
attempts to put block in wrong hole , then right hole . succeeds
opens lid to shape box and dumps it out
puts hands in shape box and back out
shuts shape box lid and pushes shape box toward Linda
picks up shape box object , holds toward lid and puts in box
picks up another shape box object . lifts lid briefly . puts shape box object in through lid . searches floor for another shape box object
takes object from shape box , shuts lid and attempts to put object in shape box . succeeds
begins to open shape box again but stops
holds shape box object out to Linda
